entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:21 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -36.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 06:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -36.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -40.5°C
Wind: NNW 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blowing snow. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 29.
